overview: The presented work that is before you is the outcome of Iranian animators and a few honorable guests' (from countries around the globe) efforts. Each and every animator was given 3 seconds to animate their objects entering the frame, hitting the surface and then making its way out through the bottom of the frame. The action was done to keep consistency throughout the work. Last but not least, the composing and adjusting of the audio were done.
title: Knock Knock
